about_the_game:
Welcome to Isometria


Embark on an epic journey into the boundless realm of Isometria, an isometric world brimming with awe-inspiring wonders. Immerse yourself in this procedurally generated universe, where every step unveils new biomes, unique creatures, and a treasure trove of craftable items.

Prepare to face a myriad of formidable foes, including mischievous slimes, cunning goblins, eerie fungos, relentless skeletons, and more. Triumph over mighty bosses to harness their powers and forge extraordinary weapons. Whether you prefer a melee, ranged, or magical approach, craft your own destiny with customizable armor and weaponry.

Venture deep into mysterious caves, goblin hideouts, ancient tombs, and haunting dungeons to uncover untold riches and amass valuable experience.

Forge Bonds, Conquer Together


Isometria is not a solitary journey - team up with friends in online multiplayer or host a dedicated server to invite others to explore your world.

Shape Your World, Your Way


Begin your adventure armed with just a handful of basic tools, and transform your surroundings through sweat and toil. From crafting powerful weapons and sturdy armor to constructing walls, doors, tables, chairs, and an array of captivating trinkets, your creativity knows no bounds. Brew potent potions and fashion exquisite jewelry to enhance your prowess in both battle and home life.

Pace Your Adventure


Play at your own rhythm - from a leisurely pace to an exhilarating rush. Isometria grants you the freedom to chart your own course, with boundless possibilities available right from the start. But heed caution, for formidable adversaries lurk beyond your comfort zone.

Game Features


  • Explore 5 distinct biomes, each with its own unique charm.
  • Confront over 20 diverse enemy types, each with their own strategies and challenges.
  • Discover a vast assortment of items, numbering in the hundreds.
  • Tailor your playstyle with options for melee combat, ranged marksmanship, or magical mastery.
  • Embark on adventures in a dynamically generated world that's always full of surprises.
  • Unleash your creativity with a robust crafting system and the freedom to build your own base.
  • Enhance your capabilities with a wide range of potions and enchanted jewelry.

Prepare to be captivated by the boundless possibilities that Isometria offers. Embark on a journey like no other and leave your indelible mark on this enchanting world.

name: Isometria Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on an isometric odyssey solo or with friends. Craft, explore, and conquer in a procedurally generated world. Face monsters, unearth treasures, and forge your destiny!
